item.title: Spark cluster how-to
item.description: This is how to get a Spark cluster running, with one master and one slave (worker). I used a droplet on digital ocean (master) and one local vagrant machine (slave). spark in vagrant References: thank you Bin kulwant singh austin ouyang Installation on all nodes (master and slaves) For the slave (worker) I used a vagrant machine as in my previous post. For the master I used a droplet on Digital Ocean.
